post.body: right for the glory of the big 12, but wrong, so wrong, for my heart :'-/
and I'm getting a little nervous...
i'd really enjoy that, call any day you're interested in stopping by!
but apparently, we're not w/each other ;-)
hooray for you! we should be home in about half an hour. Tell S and the pups that we say hi!
where's Bridgeport? and what movie? ...and tell us if it's good. :-)
has spent enough time procrastinating and now must sleep.
is holding out hope for those Buckeyes...
is looking forward to tonight's Longhorns/Buckeyes showdown
is savoring lunch @ South Bank Kitchen w/Levi & John
is catching up w/more friends and waiting for enough thaw to get my car back up the driveway
is cold and going to bed.
just finished a gigantic grocery shopping trip & just in time, I guess--our car is covered w/new snowfall.
is enjoying a late lunch & afternoon of games w/some well-missed compadres
is having dessert & coffee at the North Oak Brasserie w/my dear, dear friends
